name: Slow-Simmered Chicken Rice Soup
author: Anonymous
summary: Diced chicken breast, white and wild rice, onion, celery, seasonings and Swanson® Chicken Broth simmer to perfection in the slow cooker to make a flavorful, heart-warming soup.
ingredients: ½ cup uncooked regular long-grain white rice
5 ¼ cups Swanson® Chicken Broth (regular, Natural Goodness™ or Certified Organic)
1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breast, cut into cubes
directions: Stir the wild rice, white rice and oil in a 3 1/2-quart slow cooker
Cover and cook on HIGH for 15 minutes
Add the broth, thyme, red pepper, celery, onion and chicken to the cooker
Cover and cook for 7 to 8 hours (or on HIGH for 4 to 5 hours) or until the chicken is cooked through
Serve with the sour cream and green onions, if desired
